author: Special Correspondent
title: Third virus death in West Bengal
description: West Bengal on Tuesday recorded its third COVID-19 death. A 48-year-old woman from Howrah district who was admitted to the Howrah State General Hospital died late on Monday evening even before her tes
content:
West Bengal on Tuesday recorded its third COVID-19 death. 
A 48-year-old woman from Howrah district who was admitted to the Howrah State General Hospital died late on Monday evening even before her test reports were received by the hospital authorities. 
We… [+512 chars]
